alert.note: Alert for Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 09 at 7:58PM CDT until June 09 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN HUTCHINSON...HANSFORD...SOUTHEASTERN SHERMAN...WESTERN OCHILTREE AND NORTHEASTERN MOORE COUNTIES... At 757 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles south of Hardesty to 4 miles west of Spearman to Pringle, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Spearman, Gruver, Waka, Morse, Farnsworth and Pringle. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
